instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3208: What is 820-3208? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3208</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> AIR 11" TURNS OFF AFTER AROUND 20 MINS
threads.message:
Hi all,

this is not a LQD dmaged board.

All the power rails are ok. turns off after around 20 mins.

Any help greatly appreciate

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3208</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> AIR 11" TURNS OFF AFTER AROUND 20 MINS
threads.message:
This could be a ME region issue.
Try clean ME BIOS.
Also monitor CPU temps with HWMonitor.
You can try another heatsink, just in case the pipe is broken...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3208</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> AIR 11" TURNS OFF AFTER AROUND 20 MINS
threads.message:
Hi 2info-
Thank you very much for your help. it was me region. This is solved. Thanks again.
